based_on.title: Based on a Book
based_on.description: Movies and Series based on literary works.

11219.title: 200 Pound Beauty
11219.description: A large woman who sings for a famous Korean pop star undergoes a drastic makeover and physical transformation, aided by extensive plastic surgery.

282565.title: The Sailor Who Fell From Grace With The Sea
282565.description: After his father dies, a disturbed young boy plots to take revenge on the new man in his mother's life.

283911.title: The Girl Next Door
283911.description: Based on a true story, two orphaned sisters are placed in the care of their unstable aunt who inflicts horrifying mental and physical abuse on them.

300459.title: Not Without My Daughter
300459.description: In this thriller based on a true story, an Iranian-American man takes his American wife and daughter to visit Iran, only to keep them hostage there.

302152.title: Crime And Punishment
302152.description: A modern day interpretation of Fydor Dostoyevsky's timeless classic, "CRIME AND PUNISHMENT" is one man's search for the true meaning of his existence. But while enlightened by his revelations, he is ultimately and tragically, unable to elude his destiny.

302163.title: Rosencrantz And Guildenstern Are Dead
302163.description: The filmization of Tom Stoppard's immensely witty Shakespearean spin-off, which changes the tone of "Hamlet" from a tragedy to a comedy. Adventures of Rosencrantz and Guildenstern, two lesser characters from Hamlet, as they romp around the castle.

302705.title: Lifeforce
302705.description: A space shuttle discovers an alien spacecraft containing three frozen creatures. The crew decides to bring them to Earth, where they soon awaken...

302708.title: The Long Goodbye
302708.description: In this neo-noir thriller, a private detective is determined to solve a difficult case after he becomes a suspect in the murder of his friend’s wife.

302711.title: The Madness Of King George
302711.description: In late 18th century England, the benevolent King George III takes ill, showing signs of madness, opening the door to be usurped by his worthless son.

303185.title: Tom Sawyer
303185.description: A young Jodie Foster stars as Becky to Johnny Whitaker's Tom in this heartwarming musical rendition of Mark Twain's classic novel.

304773.title: Drugstore Cowboy
304773.description: Bob leads a family of junkies that rob drug stores for their fix. When a member dies, he goes straight. But not everyone is willing to let him leave.

304779.title: Joshua
304779.description: A possible second coming of Christ shakes up the rural town of Auburn in the form of a kind carpenter who seems capable of performing miracles.

304808.title: She-Devil
304808.description: A popular romance novelist embarks on an affair with his accountant, which proves to be the last straw for his disgruntled suburban wife.

306916.title: Stephen King's Riding the Bullet
306916.description: In this thriller by Stephen King, a hitchhiker is picked up by a shadowy figure who harbors a dark secret: one that may just cost him his life.

306938.title: Of Mice and Men
306938.description: In this adaptation of John Steinbeck's classic novel, a migrant worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

306949.title: Stanley & Iris
306949.description: He can't read; she's still grieving her dead husband. Together, they will escape their own private prisons to explore a tender relationship.

312179.title: Get Shorty
312179.description: A gangster goes to Hollywood to collect a debt and becomes a big-time producer when he realizes the movie business runs a lot like the mob.

312412.title: The Black Stallion
312412.description: A heartwarming adventure about a boy who forges a special friendship with a wild stallion after both are shipwrecked on a deserted island.

316454.title: Secretary
316454.description: Hoping to recover from her troubled past, a socially awkward woman becomes a secretary for an eccentric lawyer who is aroused by her obedience.

356526.title: Be Cool
356526.description: Chili Palmer turns to the world of rock stars, pop divas, and hip hop gangstas when a new idea for a movie leads him into the music business.

358570.title: Bubba Ho-Tep
358570.description: An aging Elvis joins forces with a fellow nursing home resident who believes he's JFK to fight a mummy who wants to steal the souls of the elderly.

371078.title: A Most Wanted Man
371078.description: When a mysterious immigrant arrives in Hamburg, he attracts the attention of U.S. and German intelligence, kicking off a race to uncover the truth.

380515.title: Child 44
380515.description: Set in the Soviet Union, an exiled secret police officer hunts a serial killer murdering children, but the trail leads to an internal cover-up.

389496.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
389496.description: A professional thief tries to rob a billionaire's mansion. But when the crook’s lucky ring is stolen, he vows revenge in this laugh-out-loud comedy.

389845.title: Rollerball
389845.description: In the future, the world's favorite sport is the extremely violent Rollerball. Can the game's most popular player show his naysayers who's boss?

394492.title: Ghost World
394492.description: Based on the well-known comic,  two high school students taking a hard look at the world they wryly observe and decide what they really want, altering their friendship forever.

404623.title: Battle Royale
404623.description: A group of students from a Japanese high school are forced to compete in a battle, killing one another until only one is left standing.

405675.title: Thief
405675.description: A master safecracker plans his last heist for the sake of a woman but the gangster who hires him won't let go so easily in this tense drama.

438114.title: Killing Me Softly
438114.description: When a woman ditches her steadfast, lackluster boyfriend for a sexy celebrity mountain climber, she descends into a realm of suspicion and fear.

447845.title: Tarzan
447845.description: Tarzan must protect the jungle, and his beloved Jane, from a greedy businessmen who wants to destroy his natural habitat for profit.

448663.title: Leaving Las Vegas
448663.description: Determined to end it all, a committed drinker picks Vegas as his last stop, but he finds comfort with a kind prostitute who needs help of her own.

462517.title: The Illusionist
462517.description: In 19th century Vienna, a magician uses his talents to win the love of a noble woman but makes an enemy of the Crown Prince, now his romantic rival.

465495.title: Horns
465495.description: A man grieving the murder of his girlfriend suddenly finds strange horns growing from his head, which may be the source of lethal psychic powers.

472908.title: Odd Thomas
472908.description: In a small desert town, a fry cook with psychic gifts, his girlfriend, and the sheriff team up to stop a weird stranger from unleashing an evil force.

475895.title: Creepshow 2
475895.description: Three gruesome tales of brutality, vengeance and the uncanny are unveiled in this this anthology horror movie based on the stories of Stephen King.

477175.title: The Midnight Meat Train
477175.description: An aspiring photographer is drawn into the path of a subway serial killer.

478814.title: Children of the Corn
478814.description: Stephen King’s tale of a couple, stranded in a rural town populated by a cult of demonic children, unfolds as they unearth a bloodcurdling secret.

493456.title: Adam Resurrected
493456.description: A former circus showman who was spared from death in a Nazi gas chamber becomes a ringleader for Holocaust survivors in an asylum after World War II.

506695.title: The Patriot
506695.description: A renowned doctor living a quiet life in Montana is thrust into a race for time to find a cure for a deadly virus, released by a rogue militia leader.

506707.title: Animal Farm
506707.description: George Orwell’s classic tale of a revolution among farm animals teaches a lesson on the cost of keeping social order with an uneven power balance.

508030.title: The Women of Brewster Place
508030.description: A group of strong-willed women struggle against circumstances in a rundown housing project on a street overflowing with tales of courage and anguish.

508135.title: A Single Shot
508135.description: When a hunter accidentally hits and kills a young woman, he discovers a box of money near her body that connects him to local criminals.

521175.title: My Friend Dahmer
521175.description: Based on a graphic novel, the story of an awkward young Jeffrey Dahmer portrays the haunting struggle of a lonely high school boy who did not fit in.

543987.title: Parker
543987.description: Based on the Donald E. Westlake novels, a thief works by a code of integrity and makes it his mission to avenge all that cross him or work dirty.

550864.title: The Passion of the Christ
550864.description: The brutal portrayal of the final hours in the life of Jesus, as he is betrayed by Judas, condemned to death, tortured, and yet performs one last act of grace.

551830.title: The Smurfs 2
551830.description: The Smurfs and their human pals must rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by a sorcerer, because she knows a spell that can foil his evil plans.

552490.title: A Chance in the World
552490.description: The inspirational true story of a gifted African-American boy who overcomes a childhood in a punishingly cruel foster home to become a wild success.

553149.title: Back Roads
553149.description: Family secrets are unearthed when Harley, who took custody of his sisters after their mom killed their dad, starts an affair with an older woman.

553650.title: The Bishop's Wife
553650.description: When a bishop in a turbulent marriage fails to raise funds to build a church, he receives help from a dashing man claiming to be an angel from heaven.

560163.title: Crisscross
560163.description: A cash-poor mother whose troubled husband left the family struggles to raise her son by stripping while he takes on side gigs that could get him hurt.

565093.title: Baggage Claim
565093.description: Paula Patton stars as flight attendant Montana Moore, who is tired of the single life, hoping to meet the perfect man before her sister’s wedding.

577505.title: In the Time of the Butterflies
577505.description: Fact-based drama about the dictatorship of General Trujillo in the Dominican Republic and the murder of three sisters who rebelled against oppression.

577927.title: Bank Shot
577927.description: Fresh from his recent jailbreak, criminal mastermind Walter Ballantine (George C. Scott) is already plotting his next bank heist. And this time he's thinking big...he's not just taking the loot, he's stealing the whole bank! Beset by a hapless crew, a lusty backer and an overzealous prison warden, Ballantine soon discovers that when your getaway vehicle is the bank itself, it pays to be America's most driven criminal. Brimming with wonderful and imaginative silliness.

586151.title: The Andromeda Strain (1971)
586151.description: Follow Michael Crichton’s intense story of a scientific team working around the clock to stop an alien germ brought back by a space probe.

589088.title: Practical Magic
589088.description: Two magical New England sisters must outwit and overcome their family curse, which dooms the men they love to die in tragic circumstances.

589292.title: The Mask
589292.description: Jim Carrey’s superstar role as a kind and meek bank teller who gets super powers from a Nordic mask and becomes a totally s-s-s-smokin’ hero!

589380.title: Dennis the Menace
589380.description: Based on the beloved comic strip, a well-meaning but wholly destructive little boy unwittingly wreaks mayhem upon his surly next-door neighbor.

592988.title: Ann Rule's Too Late to Say Goodbye
592988.description: Based on the popular crime novel, a wife’s death after finding out her husband cheated on her comes down to either her husband or her online crush.

599958.title: Maurice
599958.description: Set against the stifling conformity of pre-World War I English society, E.M. Forster's Maurice is a story of coming to terms with one's sexuality and identity in the face of disapproval and misunderstanding.

601850.title: Oranges and Sunshine
601850.description: True story of a social worker from England who revealed a massive social scandal where thousands of British children were deported to Australia.

603322.title: Waiting to Exhale
603322.description: Angela Bassett and Whitney Houston power this groundbreaking romantic comedy about four girlfriends in Phoenix waiting for honest love relationships.

609347.title: To Hell and Back
609347.description: Based on the Biblical story of Job, this modern take centers around a land developer who finds his business and personal life falling apart.

609668.title: Untold Scandal
609668.description: Palace intrigue threatens to take down the innocent victims of a ruthless personal bet that a royal woman makes with an equally narcissistic playboy.

610966.title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
610966.description: A team of fantastical superheroes from literary tales are assembled by a notorious adventurer in order to save the planet from annihilation.

612039.title: He Played Me
612039.description: A woman trying to keep her failing marriage together falls for a man she thinks offers love, but who is only out to destroy her piece by piece.

614727.title: The Miseducation of Cameron Post
614727.description: Chloë Grace Moretz stars as a teen who bonds with other misunderstood LGBT youth when she is forced into gay conversion therapy by her guardians.

620723.title: The Autobiography of Miss Jane Pittman
620723.description: At 110 years old, a Louisiana woman born into slavery recounts her experience from the Civil War through her involvement in the civil rights movement.

621269.title: The Trial
621269.description: A grieving small town attorney still facing the trauma of a family accident takes on a capital punishment case that transforms his life.

626763.title: Above Suspicion
626763.description: “Game of Thrones” star Emilia Clarke leads this true crime thriller as an informant whose help with an FBI agent leads to a deadly aftermath.

639313.title: The Infiltrator
639313.description: Based on a true story, a U.S. federal agent goes deep inside the inner workings of a notorious drug trafficking cartel in order to take it down.

641581.title: Somewhere in Time
641581.description: A playwright visiting a hotel falls in love with an actress pictured in a 1912 photo and uses self-hypnosis to go 68 years back in time to meet her.

642254.title: The Girl with All the Gifts
642254.description: In a bleak future, mankind has succumbed to a fungus that turns everyone into flesh-eating monsters, until an immune child is discovered.

642286.title: The Physician
642286.description: To gain admittance to medical school, an 11th Century surgeon's apprentice disguises his true identity to move forward with his quest.

657079.title: Let's Go to Prison
657079.description: When Fate steers a career criminal’s plot for revenge off-course, he sends his intended victim’s kid to prison, and then joins him in the slammer.

658082.title: To Die For
658082.description: Suzanne is dead set on being a famous TV reporter. When her husband asks her to give up her dream, she plots against him with a love-struck teenager.

663315.title: Appointment with Death
663315.description: Who planned the demise of Mrs. Boynton? Only the gifted sleuth Hercule has the skills to solve this murder! Based on the novel by Agatha Christie.

663321.title: Dirty Work
663321.description: Mitch and Sam need to raise $50,000 for Sam’s dad’s heart transplant. Out of work and out of options, the two open a revenge-for-hire business.

663814.title: The Sisters Brothers
663814.description: Brothers and assassins Eli and Charlie Sisters pursue a prospector across the American Northwest in this witty reimagining of the cinematic Western.

664874.title: Carrie
664874.description: An adaptation of the classic novel. Carrie, a girl with telekinetic powers, teaches her classmates a deadly lesson when they humiliate her at prom.

672282.title: Jumanji
672282.description: Two children find and play a magical board game, releasing a man who has been trapped in it for decades and a host of wild and exotic creatures.

676657.title: Ali & Nino
676657.description: Based on a famed love story, a Muslim man and a Christian woman defy their parents and marry, but the arrival of World War I soon tests their bond.

676665.title: The Death of Stalin
676665.description: Follows the wild scramble for power inside the Council of Ministers upon the sudden illness and death of Soviet dictator Joseph Stalin in 1953.

680200.title: Lady Macbeth
680200.description: Lust, power, and murder collide in this thriller about the awakening of a young woman’s desire in rural England, 1865.

680248.title: Spinning Man
680248.description: When a female student goes missing, a popular professor is the prime suspect. Suddenly, the questions he faces become a matter of life or death.

680736.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
680736.description: An Icelandic expedition goes horribly wrong for a scientist and crew trapped in a cave and plunged into unimagined worlds against an erupting volcano.

681622.title: Parkland
681622.description: A recounting of the chaotic events that occurred at Dallas' Parkland Hospital on the day U.S. President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.

682033.title: The Englishman's Boy
682033.description: A powerful movie producer in 1920s Hollywood tries to track down an elusive Western star to offer the lead role in his upcoming motion picture.

682050.title: I Kill Giants
682050.description: Barbara Thorson, a young woman struggling with life, is the only thing that stands between terrible giants and the destruction of her small town.

682615.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
682615.description: Jason Bourne flees a new generation of skilled CIA operatives in a non-stop race around the globe while seeking the truth behind his mysterious past.

682628.title: The Bourne Legacy
682628.description: Agent Aaron Cross uses his genetically enhanced skills to evade the CIA after Jason Bourne's actions lead to the termination of his black ops program.

684120.title: Wildlife
684120.description: Family bonds are stretched to their breaking point after a teenage boy’s father leaves home to take a dangerous job against his mother's wishes.

684127.title: Sleeping Beauty
684127.description: A haunting portrait of a shy co-ed who allows a coin toss to spark her first impromptu sexual encounter and immerse her in a dark new world.

684133.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
684133.description: Based on the true story of the academic career of an obscure Indian mathematician whose groundbreaking theories changed mathematics forever.

684147.title: The Catcher Was a Spy
684147.description: A Boston Red Sox catcher-turned-WWII spy is tasked with assassinating a Nazi atomic scientist in this true-life thriller

685536.title: Waiting for the Barbarians
685536.description: A colonial magistrate suffers a crisis of conscience when an army colonel arrives looking to interrogate the locals about an impending uprising.

685773.title: Ice Cream in the Cupboard
685773.description: After a series of unsettling incidents, including a physical attack, Pat is ready to face the unimaginable: his wife has early-onset Alzheimer's.

685922.title: The 12th Man
685922.description: Nazis hunt for the lone surviving saboteur that got away and survived for nine weeks in the winter of 1943 after Germans sank his crew’s fishing boat.

689518.title: Apt Pupil
689518.description: In 1984, 16-year-old Todd comes to discover a wanted former Nazi SS officer living in his neighborhood and blackmails him for details about his past.

689550.title: Doctors' Wives
689550.description: A group of doctors sharing a private practice who are all in dysfunctional marriages enter crisis mode when one of them murders his cheating wife.

689652.title: In the Heat of the Night
689652.description: While traveling in the deep south, a black Philadelphian homicide detective becomes embroiled in a murder investigation.

690213.title: The Horsemen
690213.description: After breaking his leg and losing a game of buzkashi that his father bet the farm on, Sharif has to learn how to ride, play and win again.

690261.title: Everything Must Go
690261.description: A salesman loses his wife and his job on the same day and, faced with his life imploding, begins living on his front lawn with all of his belongings.

690273.title: Children of the Corn: Runaway
690273.description: After escaping a murderous cult while pregnant and starting a new life in a small Oklahoma town, Ruth’s past comes looking for her and her son.

690775.title: Wrong Is Right
690775.description: A superstar TV reporter finds more than he bargained for while investigating possible links between the U.S. government and a terrorist group.

691059.title: Mafia Millionaires
691059.description: Based on an authentic Italian crime boss and family, their 40-year saga, as seen through their eyes, reflects Naples's history, beauty, and strife.

691624.title: Strange but True
691624.description: Five years after their son’s death, a family is swept into a dark mystery when his old girlfriend appears to tell them she’s pregnant with his baby.

692126.title: True to the Game 2
692126.description: Based on a NY Times Best Seller, this film picks up a year after the first film and follows the lives of the characters affected by Quadir’s murder.

692267.title: The Mighty Quinn
692267.description: The murder of a prominent businessman on a tiny Caribbean island plunges a police chief into the decadent lives of the island's white establishment.

694396.title: It
694396.description: In the town of Derry, Maine, seven young kids band together to stop a new killing cycle of an ancient, shape-shifting predator they can only call It.

694757.title: Dutch
694757.description: An ambitious heroin dealer has his sights set on becoming the East Coast’s most feared drug lord while battling a high-profile court case.

696806.title: A Walk to Remember
696806.description: North Carolina teens Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan are thrown together after one gets into trouble and is sentenced to community service.

698074.title: Homecoming
698074.description: After being abandoned by her distraught mother, 13-year-old Dicey is determined to get her three siblings to the home of their Aunt Cilla.

698965.title: The Jackal
698965.description: An engaging suspense thriller about a ruthless assassin hired to eliminate a powerful, high-ranking official in the U.S. government.

701202.title: Damascus Cover
701202.description: After a mission to smuggle a chemical weapons scientist out of Syria goes wrong, a spy discovers he is a pawn in a much bigger plan.

702699.title: Ichi the Killer
702699.description: When a mysterious assassin abducts his boss, a yakuza enforcer goes on a tear of violent retribution with the help of a trained killer.

703676.title: He Played Me 2
703676.description: In this sequel, Yazmin recovers and looks to move on from the aftermath of her tumultuous affair with Jai that threatened her life.

703698.title: Hustling
703698.description: Based on Gail Sheehy's book, a magazine reporter investigates the prostitution industry in 1970s New York City and brings to light everyone involved.

705035.title: Garfield’s Pet Force
705035.description: A titanic confrontation of publishing universes pits comic strip and comic book heroes against a vile vixen bent on conquering Cartoon World.

705036.title: Garfield’s Fun Fest
705036.description: After years of winning the annual talent competition to determine the funniest comic strip in Cartoon World, Garfield faces a challenger.

705037.title: Garfield Gets Real
705037.description: Follow Garfield behind the scenes in Cartoon World, where he grows bored with his life as a comic strip star and decides to escape to the real world.

705216.title: Colonel Effingham's Raid
705216.description: At the dawn of America's entry into World War II, a retired Army colonel rallies his small Southern town against renaming its Confederate Square.

705459.title: Swung
705459.description: A graphic, touching and funny romance that delves into the secret underside of a very modern relationship taken to its emotional and sexual limits.

705944.title: Babylon A.D.
705944.description: A ruthless mercenary is hired to smuggle a woman from the post-apocalyptic confines of Eastern Europe to the glittering megalopolis of New York City.

706961.title: The Girl in a Swing
706961.description: Alan, an art broker, falls in love with Karin, a young German woman, but their bliss gradually tarnishes as Karin begins to have menacing visions.

707761.title: Son of the South
707761.description: Follows the grandson of a klansman who comes of age in the deep South and winds up joining the civil rights movement in the summer of 1961.

708188.title: The Book of Ruth: Journey of Faith
708188.description: Powerful themes of tolerance gained through love shine in this production of the Moabite widow who produces a son with her new Israelite husband.

708351.title: Four Kids and It
708351.description: Four kids on vacation discover a magical creature on the beach with the power to grant wishes. But they face danger when each wish ends at sunset.

709246.title: Timepiece
709246.description: In this prequel to the Christmas Box, a couple struggles with the tragic death of their only child against the backdrop of a turbulent World War II.

712231.title: Messenger of Death
712231.description: Garret Smith travels to a sleepy Colorado town to investigate a brutal massacre and uncovers a sinister plot of greed and religious zealotry.

712574.title: Portrait of a Beauty
712574.description: During a time when women are not allowed to paint, a woman lives her brother's life as a painter after his death, carrying on her family name.

712894.title: The Help
712894.description: In 1960s Mississippi, a Southern girl turns her small town on its ear when she interviews African-American maids who have worked for white families.

713216.title: El Camino Secreto (Doblado)
713216.description: Una joven blanca abusada por su abuelo encuentra felicidad cuando es tomada bajo el ala de una pareja negra mayor.

713500.title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
713500.description: After sacrificing her creative ambitions to raise her kids and support her husband, a middle-aged woman embarks on a journey to rediscover herself.

713922.title: The Man in 3B
713922.description: A charismatic new tenant quickly makes his mark on a Queens apartment building, but his popularity soon results in a murder with many suspects.

714662.title: Hearts in Atlantis
714662.description: Bobby Garfield returns home for a boyhood friend’s funeral and recalls the magical summer of 1960 when a man with strange powers changed his world.

714681.title: All In
714681.description: A young mother who grew up a victim of her environment gets pulled back into a life of crime while trying to make a better future for her children.

714943.title: Don Juan DeMarco
714943.description: After losing his one true love and attempting suicide, a man who believes he’s the mythical Don Juan is placed in the care of a world-weary therapist.

714951.title: Quick Change
714951.description: A trio of first-time bank robbers commits an audaciously perfect crime but miscalculates the task of getting out of New York City with the loot.

715217.title: Vision Quest
715217.description: A gentle but driven 18-year-old underdog toils against the odds to become Washington state’s top wrestler while winning the heart of a young drifter.

715613.title: 10,000 Saints
715613.description: A teen from Vermont moves to live with his dad in New York’s East Village, where other youngsters and parents struggle to cope in the volatile 1980s.

716292.title: Burglar
716292.description: Just when a San Francisco bookstore owner is set to give up her side hustle as a burglar, a crooked cop blackmails her into committing one more heist.

716411.title: Fair Game
716411.description: He's a cop on the edge, she's a woman with a dangerous secret. And when the Russian mafia sets their sights on the pair, they're both Fair Game.

718394.title: Everything Is Illuminated
718394.description: A young Jewish-American travels to the Ukraine in hopes of finding the woman who saved his grandfather from the Nazis during World War II.

723259.title: El Libro De La Selva (Doblado)
723259.description: Secuestrado y obligado a vivir con humanos, un joven inicia una cadena de eventos cuando encuentra el tesoro maldito de un rey muerto.

724736.title: The Childhood of a Leader
724736.description: A dark coming-of-age story in which a young American boy living in France in 1918 grows into a Hitler-esque dictator amid the rising tide of fascism.

724768.title: Charlie Says
724768.description: In this take on one of the most infamous 20th century crimes, the Manson family women recount the acts they committed in service of their cult leader.

724769.title: The Female Brain
724769.description: What makes a woman swipe right for Mr. Wrong? A neuroscientist uses four sets of relationships to illustrate the science behind our romantic missteps.

724891.title: Propiedad Ajena
724891.description: La vida de una mujer cambia radicalmente cuando descubre su diario escrito en la tumba de uno de sus antepasados, pero sin el cadáver.

725799.title: The Last Mistress
725799.description: In this provocative romance, Vellini is a feisty Spanish mistress who will stop at nothing to be in the arms of her forbidden lover.

725990.title: The Limehouse Golem
725990.description: With the Limehouse Golem serial killer on the loose, Inspector Kildare must rely on help from a troubled witness to bring the maniac to justice.

100000080.title: The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
100000080.description: In Victorian England, a teen boy trying to rescue his kidnapped family from an artifact thief discovers a Midas Box that grants limitless wealth.

100000137.title: The Prince and the Surfer
100000137.description: A prince switches places with a look-alike California surfer and discovers a new world of romance, danger and adventure beyond his wildest dreams.

100000170.title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
100000170.description: In this epic conclusion, Thomas leads the Gladers on their final mission to break into the legendary Last City—the deadliest maze of all.

100000181.title: The Trial of the Incredible Hulk
100000181.description: When Dr. Banner is framed for a street crime, a blind attorney with his own vigilante identity takes his case and helps him chase an evil gangster.

100000218.title: The Secret in Their Eyes
100000218.description: A recently retired criminal court investigator writes a novel based on a twenty-five-year-old unresolved rape and murder case, which still haunts him.

100000219.title: The Smurfs
100000219.description: When evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue creatures out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into the middle of Central Park.

100000221.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
100000221.description: A mysterious map sends the Smurfs on a thrilling race through a forbidden forest filled with magical creatures to find a forgotten hamlet.

100000249.title: Red Joan
100000249.description: A suburban British widow recounts her double life as a Soviet spy in this dramatic tale of passion, courage, and betrayal based on a true story.

100000288.title: Held for Ransom
100000288.description: In 2013, young Danish photographer Daniel Rye is captured by ISIS and held hostage for 398 days, alongside several other foreign nationals.

100000376.title: Without a Trace
100000376.description: Lisa teams up with her ex-boyfriend to investigate the disappearance of her younger sister, but their search takes a dark turn when a body is found.

100000556.title: No Escape
100000556.description: A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.

100000867.title: Howard the Duck
100000867.description: A fast-talking, cigar-chomping, beer-loving duck is transported to Earth from a parallel universe and must save the planet from an alien invasion.

100001019.title: Gabriela
100001019.description: A steamy and passionate love affair between a local bar owner and a young woman soon falls into the conflicts of lust, love, and jealousy.

100001188.title: The Tribes of Palos Verdes
100001188.description: A teen looks for an escape in surfing in this exploration of the secrets that lie just beneath the surface of a California beachfront paradise.

100001211.title: The Other Woman
100001211.description: After the sudden death of her daughter, a hard-edged Manhattan attorney looks to bounce back while maintaining her marriage, family, and career.

100001362.title: Student Services
100001362.description: In order to pay for school, a broke French student becomes a massage artist and then resorts to turning tricks. Based on the steamy book by Laura D.

100001403.title: Snow Dogs
100001403.description: When Miami dentist Ted Brooks inherits a team of rambunctious sled dogs, he has to learn the trade or lose his pack to a crusty mountain man.

100001407.title: Flipped
100001407.description: “Somewhere between confusion and absolute terror,” 8th grader Bryce Loski begins to fall hard for the pesky girl who’s pined for him since age seven.

100001413.title: Matchstick Men
100001413.description: The streetwise teen daughter he never knew existed suddenly turns a neurotic con artist’s two-man team in small-time crime into a family business.

100001414.title: Charlotte Gray
100001414.description: During World War II, a young Scottish woman travels to London, then gets involved with the French Resistance while trying to rescue her missing lover.

100001416.title: Hoot
100001416.description: When a housing development threatens a fragile species of miniature owls, three kids answer the call to think big, break some rules and take a stand.

100001423.title: The Adventures of Pinocchio
100001423.description: When a fairy brings one of puppet-maker Geppetto's creations magically to life, the wooden Pinocchio learns lessons as he tries to become a real boy.

100001427.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
100001427.description: On his first day at a new school, 11-year-old Billy inadvertently challenges the town bully by accepting a dare to eat ten worms in a single day.

100001430.title: Clara's Heart
100001430.description: A Jamaican woman teaches a boy from the Maryland suburbs about life, while his self-absorbed parents grieve over the death of their other child.

100001431.title: Black Beauty
100001431.description: Experience the best and worst of humanity in Victorian-era England through the remarkable experiences of one very special, prescient horse.

100001450.title: On the Road
100001450.description: An aspiring writer takes a road trip with a charismatic new friend and his free-spirited, seductive wife in this adventure based on the iconic novel.

100001451.title: Ophelia
100001451.description: The classic Shakespearean tragedy, Hamlet, takes on a bold and new perspective, as it’s reimagined through the point of view of Ophelia.

100001475.title: Doctor Dolittle
100001475.description: A workaholic doctor disrupts his family life and raises the concerns of his colleagues when he rediscovers his ability to communicate with animals.

100001495.title: Eight Below
100001495.description: Stranded in Antarctica due to an unforgiving winter storm, a team of sled dogs must survive together until their determined trainer can rescue them.

100001593.title: Shaft
100001593.description: After his friend’s untimely death, cyber security expert John Shaft Jr. teams up with his estranged father to search the city’s criminal underbelly.

100001600.title: Crazy Rich Asians
100001600.description: Rachel travels with her boyfriend Nick to a wedding in Singapore, where she finds out his family is extremely wealthy and not very eager to meet her.

100001741.title: Nerve
100001741.description: A high school senior finds herself immersed in an online game of truth or dare, where her every move becomes manipulated by a community of "watchers."

100001930.title: The Ranger, the Cook and a Hole in the Sky
100001930.description: In 1919, a cocky young ranger learns the ways of the wilderness from a grizzled veteran as they serve in the National Forest Service in Montana.

100002108.title: The Killer
100002108.description: A retired hitman finds himself on a rescue mission when the 17-year-old girl he's agreed to look after gets in trouble with shady people.

100002113.title: Jackie Brown
100002113.description: Female flight attendant Jackie Brown becomes a key figure in a plot between the federal authorities and her street-tough arms dealer boss.

100002148.title: Alice or the Last Escapade
100002148.description: A young woman who leaves her husband one stormy night soon finds herself lost and trapped inside a fantastic paradox that defies all reality.

100002524.title: Son De Mar
100002524.description: Ulises llega a una ciudad como maestro. Conoce a Martina, se casan y tienen un hijo, y un día mientras él está pescando desaparece sin dejar rastro.

0300009901.title: Lovecraft Country
0300009901.description: Atticus Freema joins his friend Letitia and his uncle George to embark on a road trip across 1950's Jim Crow America in search of his missing father.

0300004985.title: Midsomer Murders
0300004985.description: A married veteran Detective Chief Inspector and his young sergeant investigate murders in the quaint, quirky villages of England’s Midsomer County.

0300005007.title: Cinderella and the Four Knights
0300005007.description: A good-hearted young woman is sent to live with three wealthy, entitled men in the hopes she can transform them into better people.

0300000197.title: A Woman of Independent Means
0300000197.description: Follows seven decades of love, loss and courage in the life of a member of Dallas’ high society through her two marriages, three children and beyond.

0300006953.title: Boys Over Flowers
0300006953.description: In this K-Drama classic, a poor girl attends an elite school, and is bullied by the leader of F4 (the four richest boys). He falls for her - however, she has a crush on his best friend. Whom will she choose?

0300008260.title: Case Closed (Dubbed)
0300008260.description: A high school detective is attacked by two mysterious men who force him to eat a pill that causes him to transform into a 7-year-old.

0300007209.title: Playful Kiss (Subbed)
actors: Kim Hyun-joongJung So-minLee Tae-sungLee Si-youngYoon Seung-ah
0300007209.description: When ditsy Oh Ha-ni confesses her love to studious school golden boy Seung-jo, his brutal rejection gets complicated by an earthquake that forces her to move into his house. But can living in close quarters with Ha-ni thaw Seung-jo's ice-cold heart?

0300009812.title: The Liar & His Lover (Subbed)
0300009812.description: A chronic liar—with a hidden identity as a genius composer—falls for a woman with a talented voice, despite saying he will never love a singer.

0300007896.title: The Freak Brothers
0300007896.description: After smoking a magical strain of weed and falling into a 50-year slumber, the Freak Brothers and their outspoken cat awaken in the 2020s and attempt to adjust to the bizarre rat race of modern times.

0300000159.title: Hannibal
0300000159.description: An FBI investigator with the ability to empathize with psychopaths is assigned to work with renowned psychiatrist—and secret cannibal—Hannibal Lecter.

01939.title: The Dead Zone
01939.description: Based on characters from the Stephen King novel, a young man awakens from a coma with extraordinary psychic powers, after suffering a tragic car accident.

0300005644.title: Rosemary's Baby
0300005644.description: Mini-series remake of the classic chiller about a couple who move to Paris only to find that their expensive apartment comes with a terrible cost.
